summary: Frontend testing completed for Battle Pass badge artwork upgrade. All 8 features tested and verified working correctly. AI-generated badge images from static.prod-images.emergentagent.com load properly with rarity glow effects.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Battle Pass badge artwork upgrade fully tested. All badge images hosted on static.prod-images.emergentagent.com load correctly. Badge progression: Recruit (bronze), Agent (silver/green), Veteran (gold/blue), Elite (blue), Commander (purple/gold), Apex (purple), Legend (gold), Field Marshal (red/mythic). Tier 1 reward already claimed by test user.

login_page_tactical_styling.details: Login page displays EDEN TACTICAL OPERATIONS SYSTEM branding, ACCESS TERMINAL header, OPERATOR ID/ACCESS CODE fields, INITIALIZE SESSION button

dashboard_battle_pass_widget.details: Dashboard shows Battle Pass widget with tier badge image (Recruit), XP progress bar, tier name, and XP count (5 XP)

battle_pass_tier_grid_badges.details: Battle Pass page shows tier grid with high-quality badge artwork. 10 tiers displayed: Recruit, Field Agent, Specialist, Veteran, Elite, Commander, Apex Closer, Legend, Legendary, Field Marshal

rarity_glow_effects.details: Rarity glow effects working - shadow classes applied for COMMON, UNCOMMON, RARE, EPIC, LEGENDARY, MYTHIC rarities

leaderboard_crown_icon.details: XP Leaderboard shows crown icon for 1st place (Test User at Rank 1 with 5 XP)

missions_tab_xp_rewards.details: Missions tab displays Daily Ops with XP rewards (+200 XP, +400 XP). Missions: Door Patrol, Door Marathon, Schedule Master with progress bars

sidebar_battle_pass_link.details: Navigation sidebar includes Battle Pass link with trophy icon. Clicking navigates to /battle-pass correctly

claim_tier_1_reward.details: Tier 1 reward (Recruit badge) already claimed - shows green checkmark and CLAIMED text

locations: Current tier badge in XP progress card
